5c8feda7-eea0-4e28-bda8-15a62d2c720b.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated the ability to use the PAIRIN Readiness Management System to understand the behaviors and mindsets of individuals. They can determine what motivates an individual to perform, identify potential barriers to their development, and utilize PAIRIN’s built-in coaching tips to maximize effectiveness.
5c8feda7-eea0-4e28-bda8-15a62d2c720b.name: PAIRINOLOGY 101

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all webinars and complete all learning activities, assignments, and final exam for PAIRINOLOGY 101.

db58cdfe-c156-476e-a269-a53934e4df79.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated the ability to use the PAIRIN Readiness Management System to debrief and coach individuals. They can interpret and convey PAIRIN insights, tips and questions so coachees feel affirmed in their strengths and eager to tackle potential growth areas.
db58cdfe-c156-476e-a269-a53934e4df79.name: PAIRINOLOGY 201

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all webinars and complete all learning activities, assignments, and final exam for PAIRINOLOGY 201.

09cc03c4-88ee-472a-88a3-1250689fe57b.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated the ability to effectively coach others. They have a strong foundation in the core coaching competencies including listening, questioning, designing and carrying out actions and can assist coachees in setting smart goals and discovering the paths to achieve them.
09cc03c4-88ee-472a-88a3-1250689fe57b.name: The Coaching Pathway

badge_template_activities.title: Attend all webinars and complete all learning activities, assignments, and final exam for The Coaching Pathway.

e92d56a1-f960-4060-a933-1e83fff4117e.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Assertiveness and has the drive to use power, authority, and confrontation as needed in order to achieve goals. Those with more Assertiveness are not afraid to express their needs, opinions, and desires. While mindful of others, they act in harmony with their own self-respect. They take responsibility in assuming leadership positions when the need arises.
e92d56a1-f960-4060-a933-1e83fff4117e.name: Assertiveness: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Assertiveness.

df328698-f6b4-420e-a8da-21e5473cd022.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Motivation & Determination and has the ability to identify and internalize a meaningful reason for working toward a goal. People with abundant Motivation are likely purpose-driven and goal-directed. Hard working and determined, they are usually free of self-doubt in their pursuits and can withstand disapproval or opposition.
df328698-f6b4-420e-a8da-21e5473cd022.name: Motivation & Determination: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Motivation & Determination.

ab6e3ae3-e731-4432-82b4-cb5430d99186.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Objectivity and has the ability to assess situations and make judgments based on facts rather than feelings or opinions. Those more inclined toward the Objective approach are generally responsible, calm and optimistic. As a matter of priority, they neither seek nor withdraw from relationships, which, once established, are valued.
ab6e3ae3-e731-4432-82b4-cb5430d99186.name: Objectivity: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Objectivity.

22159b4f-37f4-4812-a560-8f1be7c0739d.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Perspective and has the ability to understand broadly, coordinate, and provide clear-sighted counsel to others. People having more Perspective are usually perceived as being wise. They see situations more broadly and meaningfully than most and are able to recognize and weigh multiple points of view before making decisions. They tend to remain clear-minded, poised and persistent.
22159b4f-37f4-4812-a560-8f1be7c0739d.name: Perspective: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Perspective.

2fe6b58c-d49a-44f4-bf9d-dacc3de2db00.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Decision Making and follows a process of considering alternative possibilities, choosing from among them and following through. People more masterful in Decision Making are often clear thinking, confident and productive. Rather than guess or make snap decisions, they take time to gather and evaluate data, identify options and weigh potential consequences, and consider values and feelings.
2fe6b58c-d49a-44f4-bf9d-dacc3de2db00.name: Decision Making: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Decision Making.

e687ed3d-a9d1-43b5-a81a-4e8d839442db.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Emotional Self-Awareness and has the ability to read one's own emotions and recognize their impact. People with high Emotional Self-Awareness realize what's happening in their inner world and how this impacts others. They are able to discern subtle shades of feelings and interpret underlying causes.
e687ed3d-a9d1-43b5-a81a-4e8d839442db.name: Emotional Self-Awareness: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Emotional Self-Awareness.

6ccb5eef-7a4c-41bf-a1ad-4c1278e0da77.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Change and has the drive to pursue complexity, novelty or variety, and to avoid the predictability of order and routine. People more inclined toward Change see variety as the spice of life. Often venturesome, they relish spontaneity and challenge. Avoiding boredom at all costs, they will often pursue adventure and risk, while embracing complexity or even chaos.
6ccb5eef-7a4c-41bf-a1ad-4c1278e0da77.name: Change: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Change.

f6d322e8-4e6c-45de-8ff2-4177d142402e.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Responsibility and has the ability to perceive and react to people and circumstances with productiveness and dependability. A strong air of maturity and objectivity allows those highly inclined toward Responsibility to logically gather information and make clear decisions without becoming overly emotional. Reasonable and realistic, they are adept at organizing and executing plans.
f6d322e8-4e6c-45de-8ff2-4177d142402e.name: Responsibility: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Responsibility.

56528cc8-9309-4c90-98b1-d7e81c3e8e9e.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Self-Assessment and has a personal awareness of one’s strengths and limitations in terms of skills, abilities and values. People with more accurate Self-Assessment realistically know what they can and can’t do. Balancing confidence in their abilities with humility. Respectful of others who might have more experience or expertise, they can ask for and accept help.
56528cc8-9309-4c90-98b1-d7e81c3e8e9e.name: Self-Assessment: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Self-Assessment.

8c97849c-06fb-4e96-8de0-db77bb6d6850.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Duty and has the ability to fulfill expected or required tasks with self-discipline, consistency and sound decisions. People who are more inclined to Duty are usually alert, conscientious and productive. They make sound judgements and demonstrate self-discipline and reliability. More motivated by commitment and obligation than flexibility, freedom or adventure, they value Order and careful planning.
8c97849c-06fb-4e96-8de0-db77bb6d6850.name: Duty: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Duty.

211ded89-8602-4b81-9c88-43307d95b958.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Self-Confidence and has a sense of trust in their own abilities that leads to poised and secure behavior. People with more Self-Confidence believe in themselves and win the confidence of others. They know how to fight and overcome self-doubt, and are not easily swayed by someone else's arguments. When sensing uncertainty, they trust their ability to find the resources needed for success.
211ded89-8602-4b81-9c88-43307d95b958.name: Self-Confidence: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Self-Confidence.

46367465-533f-4684-9262-52365d2a8a86.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Achievement which represents the drive for success and the willingness to overcome obstacles for its attainment. This earner is more inclined toward Achievement and wants to accomplish something difficult. They invent, build, overcome obstacles and attain. To them, social recognition is more important than merely outperforming the competition. They demonstrate high standards, intense energy and strong enterprise.
46367465-533f-4684-9262-52365d2a8a86.name: Achievement: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Achievement.

b0afbc22-0ae3-4192-a2d3-d8d360339742.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Analysis and has the ability to use logic and fact-based evaluating over feelings. Those more inclined toward the Analytical are often responsible, calm and optimistic. Rational and purposeful, they avoid impulsiveness, indulgence and ornateness. Strong analysis and reason underpin their confident and self-disciplined behavior. They see life as rewarding when goals are specified and diligently pursued.
b0afbc22-0ae3-4192-a2d3-d8d360339742.name: Analysis: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Analysis.

6a4c2fc7-88fa-49c7-b32e-bc1673f50386.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Creativity and has the desire to think, do, and express in ways that are different from the norm. Those more inclined toward Creativity likely have many interests. They tend to pursue adventure and out-of-the-box expressions of thought. As ideas and associations come to them quickly, they will discover solutions when none seem available.
6a4c2fc7-88fa-49c7-b32e-bc1673f50386.name: Creativity: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Creativity.

90b29df1-edf4-4297-8e86-80c4a1db7c7a.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Individuality and has the global tendencies to pursue the unconventional or novel with open-mindedness and self-direction. People with more intense Individuality value and convey an outlook and life approach that is unique—"unicornish.” They seem to embrace and animate all of the attributes that compose their person: the good, not so good, and even the bizarre.
90b29df1-edf4-4297-8e86-80c4a1db7c7a.name: Individuality: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Individuality.

06a0eb24-83e5-4ee3-9e98-72733fb6fb7a.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Resiliency and has the ability to recover positivity, to rebound—after setback, difficulty or unexpected change. People more inclined toward Resiliency believe they have a great capacity for stretching and assume that their personal best is yet to come. They regularly envision the bright and assorted benefits that will result from the attainment of their lofty goals.
06a0eb24-83e5-4ee3-9e98-72733fb6fb7a.name: Resiliency: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Resiliency.

7bb77022-8766-4d05-b9f4-0b219b04bd1e.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Sociability and has the ability to promote interpersonal harmony through warm, agreeable and encouraging behaviors. People more inclined toward Sociability are friendly, responsive and diplomatic. They trust and gain the trust of others with ease. Stimulated by group settings, they are interpersonally warm and encouraging. They bring value to people because they value people.
7bb77022-8766-4d05-b9f4-0b219b04bd1e.name: Sociability: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Sociability.

7e2ccac5-c336-480d-9a3c-c08ba16c3c5a.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Order and has the drive to organize and plan one's activities and to maintain efficiency and neatness. People more inclined toward Order are organizers and planners. They bring clarity to chaos and maintain a neat environment—a place for everything and everything in its place. Orderly people are usually self-disciplined, punctual, well-prioritized, highly productive and efficient.
7e2ccac5-c336-480d-9a3c-c08ba16c3c5a.name: Order: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Order.

0b7d77dd-6c53-462a-8433-6be07d988c3c.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Self-Management and has the ability to use awareness of one’s emotions to positively direct one’s behavior and be flexible. People more masterful in Self-Management tend to be confident, self-controlled, self-motivated, sincere and straightforward—in other words, successful! They delay gratification to pursue goals and will welcome new approaches and ideas.
0b7d77dd-6c53-462a-8433-6be07d988c3c.name: Self-Management: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Self-Management.

3298ab7d-d17d-432d-952a-05f46ffc1d0b.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Self-Restraint and has the ability to hold instinctive desires in check. People with high Self-Restraint typically keep their impulses and actions in check. They are usually diligent, reliable and peaceable. Often more reserved than others, high scorers embrace traditional values and are less inclined to take risks.
3298ab7d-d17d-432d-952a-05f46ffc1d0b.name: Self-Restraint: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Self-Restraint.

2c62016b-cc10-4d5f-b8c9-5920c3d35fde.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Conflict Management and has the ability to effectively negotiate and resolve disagreements.. Those more masterful at Conflict Management are able to negotiate difficult individuals and groups with discernment and diplomacy. Rather than resorting to one of several default styles, they discern and adopt the most effective approach—seeking compromise when necessary and productive.
2c62016b-cc10-4d5f-b8c9-5920c3d35fde.name: Conflict Management: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Conflict Management.

6d7a4f90-12c9-4157-bdbc-96741e65207a.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Personal Power and has the drive to lead, command or influence—to impact others and the world. Those with a more intense level of Personal Power are likely to take leadership roles with confidence, strong opinions and lofty aims. They are strong, determined, and direct in communication. They are able to direct others toward the achievement of goals and may even "need" to be in charge at times.
6d7a4f90-12c9-4157-bdbc-96741e65207a.name: Personal Power: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Personal Power.

4344a259-69e5-4afa-b1ec-da670665e8de.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Relationship Management and has the ability to use awareness of emotions to navigate interactions successfully. People more inclined toward Relationship Management tend to draw out the best in others. They masterfully motivate people to trust, grow, cooperate and resolve conflict. Adept in negotiating agreement, they can often gain collaborative behavior from competitors.
4344a259-69e5-4afa-b1ec-da670665e8de.name: Relationship Management: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Relationship Management.

94d2ffcc-9078-486f-afa8-8c0b62d9e2c9.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Stress Tolerance and has the ability to endure pressure or uncertainty without becoming negative toward self or others. People with higher Stress Tolerance effectively handle and may even thrive in high-pressure situations. They rise to the challenge of wrestling problems to resolution, and can cope when deadlines are moved up.
94d2ffcc-9078-486f-afa8-8c0b62d9e2c9.name: Stress Tolerance: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Stress Tolerance.

dbff3745-dc6d-4e30-827a-1ba636d6a055.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Engagement and has the tendency to eagerly participate. An indication of enthusiasm for entering into new activities. People abundantly prone to Engagement tend to be accessible and reactive to the world around them. Their active minds can seem at once beautiful and relentless potentially exhausting to those more subdued.
dbff3745-dc6d-4e30-827a-1ba636d6a055.name: Engagement: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Engagement.

81bf6a30-1665-400f-b0a0-e85f147fd4a4.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Organizational Awareness and has the ability to discern a group’s context (interpersonal dynamics, culture, and trends). Those attuned to Organizational Awareness read the forces at play within a body of people, including its driving relationships. They grasp the underlying structure, motivations and “ways” of the group, likely reflecting its values to the outside world.
81bf6a30-1665-400f-b0a0-e85f147fd4a4.name: Organizational Awareness: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Organizational Awareness.

7ea26290-8059-48cc-96a1-646e3229b10d.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Empathy and has the ability to understand and identify with the feelings of other beings. People more prone to Empathy are able to step into the shoes of another person. They sense what people experience or endure, and use that understanding to inform how they respond and relate.
7ea26290-8059-48cc-96a1-646e3229b10d.name: Empathy: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Empathy.

cd53e7bc-350e-488c-bee5-c109ba8b4272.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Self-Awareness and has the ability to realize one's internal states and recognize their external effects. People with abundant Self-Awareness are in tune with themselves and how they affect others. Neither overly critical nor unrealistically hopeful, they are honest and confident. Defined values and goals guide their actions. These individuals can acknowledge limitations and own up to mistakes.
cd53e7bc-350e-488c-bee5-c109ba8b4272.name: Self-Awareness: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Self-Awareness.

aa5da308-cb55-447b-b677-93d4d7dfc716.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Well-Being & Equilibrium and has the ability to display inner balance and satisfaction in life situations. People more inclined toward Well-Being & Equilibrium usually maintain a contented state. They are calm, emotionally stable and free of persistent negative feelings. Not easily shaken, they can have a reassuring effect on a team and handle leadership well.
aa5da308-cb55-447b-b677-93d4d7dfc716.name: Well-Being & Equilibrium: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Well-Being & Equilibrium.

f52573ea-15e0-446f-a02e-cbb323ce1be5.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Aestheticism and has the ability to find, recognize, and relish the existence of beauty or excellence. Those highly attuned to Aestheticism sense beauty, talent, and goodness in the arts, nature, math, science, or in everyday experience. To them, experiences can seem jaw-dropping, spine-tingling, hair-raising, mind-boggling, breath-taking or heart-stopping!
f52573ea-15e0-446f-a02e-cbb323ce1be5.name: Aestheticism: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Aestheticism.

7ed2d0ce-a2e7-45c9-aeb2-bd6a95600a46.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Attraction of Followers and has the ability to draw others to follow by being aware of their concerns. More intense scorers in Attraction of Followers care about people and are usually energized by relationships. They pay attention to others’ motivations and behaviors, and like to encourage personal and interpersonal development.
7ed2d0ce-a2e7-45c9-aeb2-bd6a95600a46.name: Attraction of Followers: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Attraction of Followers.

fc029405-f011-45ba-b073-051256276e2a.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Enriching Others and perceives others with acceptance while supporting their development toward full potential. People more inclined toward Enriching Others are understanding mentors or coaches. Friendly, kind and forgiving, they are genuinely interested in helping others to relate well and reach full potential.
fc029405-f011-45ba-b073-051256276e2a.name: Enriching Others: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Enriching Others.

b75df766-4fb5-4dc4-b078-a5db15f209c2.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Imagination and has the ability to form mental images of objects, scenes, or events that are not present or do not exist. Those inclined toward the Imaginative approach tend to think and express in cultured, vibrant or multifaceted ways. They prefer engaging people who supply connection or attention.
b75df766-4fb5-4dc4-b078-a5db15f209c2.name: Imagination: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Imagination.

cfbe4efc-f112-4601-99be-ace6847e1afe.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Integrity and represents the degree to which words and actions (private and public) align with one’s beliefs and values. People with more Integrity are "true to themselves" both privately and publicly. Their clear-cut personal standards result in wholesome, honest, and ethical behaviors. “What you see is what you get.” In turn, these individuals expect honest straight talk from others.
cfbe4efc-f112-4601-99be-ace6847e1afe.name: Integrity: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Integrity.

5939209b-8e2c-4f46-96ee-af3dfcda0d05.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Intuition and has the ability to understand certain things without using conscious reasoning or thought. Those more inclined toward the Intuitive approach are skilled in identifying associations. They are able to draw inferences, clarify complex situations and uncover underlying causes as well as pursue self-defined goals with confidence and resolve.
5939209b-8e2c-4f46-96ee-af3dfcda0d05.name: Intuition : Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Intuition.

a3bf434c-2869-424f-9a57-6b0e6290d1a9.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Rationality and has the ability to think reasonably and apply general principles in solving specific problems. People more inclined toward Rationality are more internally focused. Their outlook is typically inquisitive, investigative, informed, and rather headstrong. They can be responsive to people and to their attitudes and ideas, but tend to maintain some degree of distance from them.
a3bf434c-2869-424f-9a57-6b0e6290d1a9.name: Rationality: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Rationality.

e42a4944-31a8-447e-a29e-3ce1bb6f5e8a.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Innovation and represents creativity harnessed into significant positive change. People more oriented toward Innovation are typically venturesome, aesthetically reactive, clever and responsive. People are likely to recognize their breadth of interests, cognitive ability, and ideational fluency. High scorers are not content with doing something the conventional way if a better way is possible.
e42a4944-31a8-447e-a29e-3ce1bb6f5e8a.name: Innovation: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Innovation.

2f860d21-7577-4b61-8fd0-420cd4744358.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Originality and has the ability to invent ideas, methods, or products of the first order. When more inclined toward Originality, people tend to look for the extraordinary in the ordinary, harmony in disharmony, and even sense in nonsense—possibly confounding to other types, who may consider them eccentric. Creative, independent, spontaneous behavior is often more important than conformity.
2f860d21-7577-4b61-8fd0-420cd4744358.name: Originality: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Originality.

cebb8e77-df59-4df1-b03a-d1bbc4b8e2bb.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Perceptivity and has the drive to understand the emotional and intellectual processes of oneself and others. People with more Perceptivity dare to go deep! They are both self-aware and eager to understand the needs, motivations and experiences of others. They see benefit in discussing one's problems and can become intrigued by emotional nuances.
cebb8e77-df59-4df1-b03a-d1bbc4b8e2bb.name: Perceptivity: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Perceptivity.

d77c9b19-18b3-4bd8-98f4-0a948945177a.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Social Awareness and has the ability to relate and respond to the feelings, needs and concerns of individuals or groups. People with more Social Awareness are highly attuned to others' emotional needs, feelings and abilities, both on a personal and organizational level. They are able to identify with diverse perspectives and pick up on emotional cues and social constructs.
d77c9b19-18b3-4bd8-98f4-0a948945177a.name: Social Awareness: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Social Awareness.

fb7c8398-ac04-4e37-8d8f-8a32dc5a0688.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Conceptualization and has the ability to synthesize & find patterns and connections among information to form abstract ideas. Those more inclined toward the Conceptual approach are skilled in identifying patterns. They are able to draw inferences, clarify complex situations and uncover underlying causes. Their thinking is an intuitive process involving fusion (and friction) between ideas and inklings.
fb7c8398-ac04-4e37-8d8f-8a32dc5a0688.name: Conceptualization: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Conceptualization.

65d729b7-2285-4f0f-b27c-a48c27a48abc.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Cooperation and tends to think in a calm and commonsense manner. People more inclined toward the Cooperative approach tend to be strong in concrete, sincere and realistic thinking. They incorporate personal values, experience and active experimentation to process and interact. These individuals tend to be upbeat and uncomplicated—eager and equipped for tasks that integrate people.
65d729b7-2285-4f0f-b27c-a48c27a48abc.name: Cooperation: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Cooperation.

ba48f085-92b5-4cbd-8ddd-824ae4e08370.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Dynamism and has the global tendencies to generate results through intentional, resourceful, energetic mindsets and behaviors. Dynamism describes powerful drive and ability to generate. Think of an electric dynamo! High scorers are energetic, hardworking and forceful. They are unafraid when facing complex challenges. They invent ways to get things done with little outside Motivation required.
ba48f085-92b5-4cbd-8ddd-824ae4e08370.name: Dynamism: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Dynamism.

ef83a253-69ab-45e4-bcba-1e4357c4deec.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Humanity and represents a composite of positive attributes that involve tending and befriending others. People more inclined toward Humanity eagerly seek to improve the welfare and happiness of others. They see individuals in ways that make them feel truly valued and special. Warm and caring, they do more than what is only fair: they are generously giving, unconditionally kind, and quick to forgive.
ef83a253-69ab-45e4-bcba-1e4357c4deec.name: Humanity: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Humanity.

1b162db3-3078-4abe-9764-f0cc277a2ffb.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Inspiration and has the ability to 'motivate' myself and/or others toward new ideas or action. Those inclined toward the Inspirational approach tend to think and express in cultured, vibrant or multifaceted ways. Often creatively playful, they prefer upbeat, social interaction to mentally demanding or repetitive tasks.
1b162db3-3078-4abe-9764-f0cc277a2ffb.name: Inspiration: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Inspiration.

3ec60831-947b-4a81-a0f2-55e7ad85ed05.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Justice and has a composite of civic related strengths that underlie healthy community life. People more inclined toward Justice tend to be capable, principled and uncompromising. Concerned for optimal interaction between the individual and the group, they will not observe unfairness, discrimination or dishonesty with apathy. High scorers are often confident and motivated to step into leadership.
3ec60831-947b-4a81-a0f2-55e7ad85ed05.name: Justice: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Justice.

0dc2ebd4-cfca-40be-ac90-fb32253a05fa.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Love of Learning and has the well-developed individual interest with which a person engages new content, information or skills. Those with abundant Love of Learning have an unquenchable curiosity. They are keen to learn new things and acquire new skills. They enjoy activities that provide challenge, create interest, and feed curiosity.
0dc2ebd4-cfca-40be-ac90-fb32253a05fa.name: Love of Learning: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Love of Learning.

149f3b2b-91c4-449e-bad8-12d73f0e4cce.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Practicality and undertakes actions and decisions that are rational, realistic, and useful. People more inclined toward the Practical approach tend to be concrete and contented. Accepting of their role in life, these individuals tend to be uncomplicated, down-to-earth, upbeat and loyal. People tend to confide their personal feelings and experiences to them.
149f3b2b-91c4-449e-bad8-12d73f0e4cce.name: Practicality: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Practicality.

478f69c0-bbb2-4212-8d4f-c090cd090aef.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Service Orientation and has the ability to anticipate, identify and meet people’s unspoken needs. Those more oriented toward Service are finely tuned to what people really need, and can match those needs with products or services. Throughout the relating process, they gladly make themselves available, monitor satisfaction, and gather feedback.
478f69c0-bbb2-4212-8d4f-c090cd090aef.name: Service Orientation: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Service Orientation.

95bdc2fa-f612-47c9-875e-8921343ef2e6.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Supportiveness and has the drive to assist, protect and provide for others in emotional or physical need. Those more inclined toward Supportiveness tend to help, care for, and develop others. They are energized by people and motivated to meet their emotional and physical needs. Usually compassionate and encouraging, these relationship builders are inclined to see the good in humanity.
95bdc2fa-f612-47c9-875e-8921343ef2e6.name: Supportiveness: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Supportiveness.

0dd054e0-6672-4f08-83c6-fc76cbb9ad9d.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Vitality and has the drive to live life with zest, well-being, hearty enjoyment and warm relationships. People with more intense Vitality approach life with authenticity, spontaneity and warm enthusiasm. They tend to radiate that special something, living their lives fully engaged and meaningfully connected. These individuals tend to invigorate those around them and bring new energy to situations.
0dd054e0-6672-4f08-83c6-fc76cbb9ad9d.name: Vitality: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Vitality.

31383b81-4c5e-47d9-8d28-9a613af4739e.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Self-Alignment and has integration between their real self-image and their ideal self. People with more Self-Alignment see their real and ideal selves as similar. When this sense of congruence draws from genuine self-worth, they feel little need to defend or boast. Confident, poised and aspiring, they are able to accept and love themselves—faults and all.
31383b81-4c5e-47d9-8d28-9a613af4739e.name: Self-Alignment: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Self-Alignment.

59004388-3e51-46ee-83c4-c5ed03d55c5b.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Moderation and has a composite of strengths that elevate genuine personal and relational well-being over self-indulgence. People with more Moderation are strong in disciplines that promote relational acceptance and ease. Having an overall respect for boundaries, these people are forbearing, unpretentious and sincere. They are likely to give others the benefit of the doubt.
59004388-3e51-46ee-83c4-c5ed03d55c5b.name: Moderation: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Moderation.

db15eef6-7fdf-4fca-8ba8-8829ceead0ba.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated Persistence and has the drive to firmly continue in a course of action, despite difficulty, opposition or warning. People with more Persistence tend to finish what they start. Hardship and adversity rarely derail them from reaching their goals. Often motivated by a sense of purpose or duty, they maintain focus and can be depended upon to deliver on commitments.
db15eef6-7fdf-4fca-8ba8-8829ceead0ba.name: Persistence: Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all learning activities for the soft skills online curriculum for Persistence.
